transformations.name: faltable
transformations.description: fal table with currency column from tcrossreference

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FROM_CURRENCY_ID as double,
		TO_CURRENCY_ID as double,
		EXCHANGE_FROM_DATE as timestamp,
		EXCHANGE_RATE as decimal(38,18),
		EXCHANGE_TO_DATE as timestamp,
		FROM_CURRENCY_CODE as string,
		TO_CURRENCY_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> hlpExchangeRateToUsd
source(output(
		filacseq as decimal(38,18),
		filacstat as string,
		filagaid as string,
		filcadate as timestamp,
		filcasign as string,
		filcastamp as string,
		filcdoctype as string,
		filcfunc as string,
		filcordocn as decimal(38,18),
		filcortyp as decimal(38,18),
		filcosig1 as string,
		filcosig2 as string,
		filcrdate as timestamp,
		filcrsign as string,
		filcrstamp as string,
		filcspbusndiv as decimal(38,18),
		filcspbusnfunc as string,
		filcspcondgrp as decimal(38,18),
		filcspintrst as string,
		filcsplimit as decimal(38,18),
		filctrldate as timestamp,
		filctrlsign as string,
		fildistext35 as string,
		fildocdate as timestamp,
		fildocmain as string,
		fildocn as decimal(38,18),
		fildodate as timestamp,
		fildostamp as string,
		filexpdate as timestamp,
		filexpeosign as string,
		filexpstatus as string,
		filexternalref as string,
		filfilid as string,
		filgldate as timestamp,
		filglrunno as decimal(38,18),
		filglstamp as string,
		filingform as string,
		filknvmark as string,
		fillisig1 as string,
		fillisig2 as string,
		filnoaccounting as string,
		filordate as timestamp,
		filoridintrstdate as timestamp,
		filorsign as string,
		filorstamp as string,
		filrefbase as decimal(38,18),
		filresig1 as decimal(38,18),
		filresig2 as decimal(38,18),
		filvaldate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> fil
source(output(
		falaccadrpeaid as decimal(38,18),
		falaccamtp as decimal(38,18),

		falduedate as timestamp,
		falduest as decimal(38,18),

		fallccid as string,

		falmailaddress as string,
		falmark as string,
		falnreaccnynsw as string,
		falnsci as decimal(38,18),
		falobno as decimal(38,18),
		falolddocno as decimal(38,18),

		faloutcode as decimal(38,18),
		faloutform as string,
		faloutstanding as decimal(38,18),

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> fal
source(output(
		lccadddescrlev1 as string,
		lccadddescrlev2 as string,
		lccadddescrlev3 as string,
		lccadddescrlev4 as string,
		lccadditionaltxt as string,
		lccadjuster as string,
		lccalleged1 as string,
		lccalleged2 as string,
		lccallegedtxt as string,
		lccamount as decimal(38,18),
		lccamtdispunknown as string,
		lcccargotype as string,
		lcccarriagemethod as string,
		lcccause as string,
		lcccausetxt as string,
		lccclmamtynsw as string,
		lccclmdet as string,
		lccclmtype as string,
		lccclupcommenced as decimal(38,18),
		lccclupcompleted as decimal(38,18),
		lccconseq as string,
		lccconseqos as string,
		lcccurr as string,
		lccdecision as decimal(38,18),
		lccdisembarkedat as string,
		lccdisembarkeddate as timestamp,
		lccdisembarkiso as string,
		lccembarkedat as string,
		lccembarkeddate as timestamp,
		lccembarkiso as string,
		lccemergevac as string,
		lccfduty as decimal(38,18),
		lccgrossamount as decimal(38,18),
		lccgrosssettle as decimal(38,18),
		lcchandlebyclms as string,
		lccinitcontpoint as string,
		lccinlitigation as string,
		lccjurisdiction as string,
		lccladid as decimal(38,18),
		lcclcaid as string,
		lcclccid as string,
		lcclightcccid as string,
		lccln6 as decimal(38,18),
		lccloconvess as string,
		lccloconvesstxt as string,
		lccmafareatxt as string,
		lccmaffectarea as string,
		lccmanos as string,
		lccmanouver as string,
		lccmfkey as string,
		lccnpersons as decimal(38,18),
		lccothshipname as string,
		lccpeaid as decimal(38,18),
		lccpilotname as string,
		lccpilotonboard as string,
		lccpollutant as string,
		lccradnavynsw as string,
		lccrecovccvid as decimal(38,18),
		lccrecovcom as string,
		lccrecovcurr as string,
		lccrecovery as decimal(38,18),
		lccrecovyn as string,
		lccremarks as string,
		lccrolecat as string,
		lccrule as string,
		lccruleofcov as string,
		lccsettlement as decimal(38,18),
		lcctext as string,
		lcctrtmco as decimal(38,18),
		lccuwsign as string,
		lccvessdevi as string,
		lccvisiblcccid as string,
		lccvoyagefr as string,
		lccvoyageto as string,
		lccvoyfriso as string,
		lccvoytoiso as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> lcc
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> tCrossReference
tCrossReference filter(SOURCE_SYSTEM == 'PARIS' && CODE_TYPE_ID == 124) ~> xRefCurrency
hlpExchangeRateToUsd select(mapColumn(
		EXCHANGE_FROM_DATE,
		EXCHANGE_RATE,
		FROM_CURRENCY_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> exchrateUSD
fil select(mapColumn(
		filfilid,
		filvaldate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filtable
lcc select(mapColumn(
		lcclccid,
		lcclcaid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> lcctable
fal, xRefCurrency lookup(falcurr == SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupCurrency
LookupCurrency select(mapColumn(
		falfilid,
		falinout,
		faloutcode,
		falsettled,
		faloutstanding,
		fallccid,
		falcurr = TARGET_CODE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> faltable
lcctable, faltable join(lcclccid == fallccid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> lccfal
lccfal, filtable join(falfilid == filfilid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> lccfil
lccfil, exchrateUSD join(coalesce(falcurr,'USD') == FROM_CURRENCY_CODE
	&& filvaldate == EXCHANGE_FROM_DATE,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> lccexchrateusd
lccexchrateusd derive(claim_incurred_usd = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn1
